EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Lean Startup Conference_Q415.Post - Event Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Your subscription to Pivotal news and events has been confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your online submission to Pivotal news and events has been confirmed. In the meantime, here are some great resources to keep the conversation going:
- Learn how our customers work with Pivotal <[[http://pivotal.io/customers#labs]]> to transform the way they build and release products, drive decisions, and interact with customers. - Apply for a Pivotal Labs Product Office Hours <[[http://pivotal.io/office-hours]]> session to workshop a specific product or design challenge and walk away with actionable advice - all completely free of charge! - Explore the Pivotal Podcast Series <[[http://blog.pivotal.io/podcasts-pivotal]]>, which includes interviews and discussions about how organizations can be more open, agile and cloud-ready.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
